name: One Shot Challenge
description:
How good are you at shooting? Let's see you at work.

The One Shot Challenge is a casual game that tests your accuracy. Your mission is to kill all the zombies that stand in your way, but there It's just a small problem, you have just a few bullets to shoot them all.

This is why you should to constantly look at how many patrons you have left in order not to lose the level. Maintain clear thinking to be able to keep the situation under control.

Try to dominate, don't let them do it!

Game Features :
- 100 levels
- A girl who needs to be saved
- Limited bullets
